sentences.en: After breaking out of jail, he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 他越狱后躲藏在一个无人居住的农舍里。

sentences.en: After breaking out of the jail， he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 他越狱后，暗藏在一个无人居住的农舍里。

sentences.en: Celeste asked for the money as a down payment on an old farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 西莉斯特要这笔钱来支付购买一家旧农舍的首付。

sentences.en: He lives in a farmhouse with a difference.
sentences.cn: 他住在一间与众不同的农舍里.

sentences.en: He tried to recall the layout of the farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 他努力回想农舍的布局。

sentences.en: I have more pleasure in a snug farmhouse than a watchtower.
sentences.cn: 我对一座整洁的农舍比对一座岗楼更感兴趣.

sentences.en: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯动身去他在康涅狄格州的偏僻农舍了。

sentences.en: The farmhouse stands by itself in the fields.
sentences.cn: 农舍孤零零地坐落在田间.

sentences.en: The only access to the farmhouse is across the fields.
sentences.cn: 去那农舍的唯一通路是穿过田野。

sentences.en: The only access to the farmhouse is across the fields.
sentences.cn: 要到那农舍去唯有穿过田地.

sentences.en: The wolf littered in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 狼在一个没人居住的农家房子产仔。

sentences.en: We drove along a muddy lane to reach the farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 我们驾车沿泥泞的小路到达农舍。

sentences.en: We fanned out from the farmhouse in twos and threes.
sentences.cn: 我们三三两两从农舍散去。

sentences.en: We fell for the farmhouse as soon as we saw it.
sentences.cn: 我们对那所农舍一见倾心.

sentences.en: We put up for the night at a farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 我们在一间农舍投宿了一夜.

sentences.en: You're safe up in the mountains, in a special farmhouse I own.
sentences.cn: 你待在山区里, 待在我自己农场的特别住房里,是安全的.

trans.tran_en: the main house on a farm, where the farmer lives
